Sentencas: A fundamental step for a sustainable industrial development based on H-2
Titulo: Effect of process modification and presence of H2O2 in the synthesis of samaria-doped ceria powders for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Economy is the implementation of fuel cell technology, in terms of new devices, materials and convenient processes for their production.
Titulo: Effect of process modification and presence of H2O2 in the synthesis of samaria-doped ceria powders for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Rare earth doped ceria oxides are suitable materials for the new generations of cells and their cost effective production becomes fundamental as the price of rare earths is increasing.
Titulo: Effect of process modification and presence of H2O2 in the synthesis of samaria-doped ceria powders for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: In this view, our study investigates a modified method of co-precipitation of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9-x. (SDC) evaluating the effects of adding of H2O2 in the process.
Titulo: Effect of process modification and presence of H2O2 in the synthesis of samaria-doped ceria powders for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The parameters controlled were the molar ratio [H2O2]/[M3+], (M3+ = Ce3+, Sm3+ present in starting nitrate salts solutions) and the pH of precipitation; in some cases the precipitates were also treated under reflux at 373 K overnight.
Titulo: Effect of process modification and presence of H2O2 in the synthesis of samaria-doped ceria powders for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The powder catalysts, both as fresh precipitates and calcined oxides were analyzed via N-2 adsorption (BET), X-Ray diffraction (XRD) and temperature programmed reduction (TPR) techniques and their morphological, structural and redox properties were correlated with the synthesis parameters used.
Titulo: Effect of process modification and presence of H2O2 in the synthesis of samaria-doped ceria powders for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity properties of these materials have also been investigated via electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) and the results compared with those of a commercial oxide.
Titulo: Effect of process modification and presence of H2O2 in the synthesis of samaria-doped ceria powders for fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The synthesis approach was shown to be very versatile in the development of materials with properties exploitable for applications in catalysis and in intermediate temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (IT-SOFC) systems.
